description:
L'Envol Parfum by Cartier - A Masterpiece of Ethereal Elegance

Experience the extraordinary journey of Cartier L'Envol Parfum, an 80ml masterpiece that transcends ordinary fragrances. This luxurious men's parfum captures the essence of freedom and adventure with its sophisticated blend of honey and guaiac wood notes. âœ¨

The Essence of L'Envol by Cartier

Created by master perfumer Mathilde Laurent in 2016, L'Envol Parfum represents the pinnacle of Cartier's fragrance artistry. The name "L'Envol" (meaning "The Flight") perfectly embodies this scent's ability to transport you to new sensory heights. This premium parfum concentration offers exceptional longevity and sillage that commands attention without overwhelming. ðŸ”¥

Product Information
Size 80ml
Gender Men
Product Type Parfum (Highest Concentration)
Concentration Parfum (Extrait)
Brand Cartier

Fragrance Profile: A Symphony of Notes

The honey-dominant scent of L'Envol Parfum creates a captivating aura that evolves beautifully throughout the day. The unique composition balances sweetness with woody depth for a truly distinctive signature. ðŸ’Ž

Fragrance Notes
Top Notes Honey, Violet Leaf
Heart Notes Iris, Musk, Patchouli
Base Notes Guaiac Wood, Vetiver, Amberwood

Key Features of Cartier L'Envol Parfum

  • Exceptional longevity (8+ hours) with the premium parfum concentration ðŸŒ¿
  • Distinctive honey-wood accord that creates a memorable signature
  • Versatile fragrance suitable for both special occasions and daily wear
  • Housed in Cartier's innovative floating bottle design - a true collector's item
  • Perfect balance between sweetness and masculinity
  • Part of Cartier's best-selling fragrance collection

The Heritage Behind L'Envol Parfum

Inspired by Cartier's legacy of creating objects that combine functionality with art, L'Envol's bottle design references the pioneering spirit of early aviation. The unique suspended inner vial creates the illusion of a flying potion, perfectly aligned with the fragrance's name and concept. As a new arrival in our premium collection, this Cartier men's parfum represents the pinnacle of French perfumery excellence. ðŸ’«

Frequently Asked Question

What makes L'Envol Parfum different from the Eau de Parfum version?

The L'Envol Parfum edition features a higher concentration of fragrance oils (20-30%) compared to the Eau de Parfum (15-20%), resulting in significantly enhanced longevity and projection. The Parfum version also emphasizes the rich honey and woody notes more prominently, creating a more opulent and refined experience with greater depth and complexity. This parfum concentration is the most prestigious and long-lasting formulation in the Cartier L'Envol collection. ðŸŒ¸
